question: The theme for International Museum Day 2018 is ___________.
option3: Hyperconnected museums: New approaches, new publics
answer: Hyperconnected museums: New approaches, new publics
explanation: International Museum Day was celebrated all over the world on May 18. The International Museum Day is celebrated every year on 18th May since 1977. It is coordinated by the International Council of Museums (ICOM). International Museum Day is celebrated every year to create awareness on the importance of museums for the development of society. The theme for International Museum Day 2018 is: "Hyperconnected museums: New approaches, new publics".
